[body 3]

MiniVend Tech Tip No. 5

MiniVend has been tested on Linux, FreeBSD, OSF/1, Solaris 2, and SunOS. If you successfully install and run it on another operating system, please let us know . The base server should be very portable -- and quite reliable. Robustness is much improved for MiniVend 2.0. If you have any problems with the program, please let me know that too. The goal is to make MiniVend run on any UNIX with Perl 5.
